trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Niagara Falls
There was one other sighting in Niagara Falls on or around November 23rd 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: THIRD SIGHTING, Bar shaped ufo's, this time, Triangles and Large Disc shape as well
divs: sighting detailsmy most spectacular viewing of multiple objects over the niagara falls was november 23rd at 5:55pm when they faded slowly into view. the first time was nov 10th, second time nov 15th and this time november 23rd 2009. this signting lasted 4 hours this time after it faded in and out a few times, and had 1 amazing climax around 7pm with multiple objects of different shapes appearing as pictured! objects included the original 3 bar shaped objects, a couple triangles smaller sized, fainter bars and 1 giant either disc or triangular craft with a blueish\purple light in the center. these objects were stationary, like rocks, hovering silently, except for when i saw the 3 pars object come down rotating slightly. as the other times, there were 2 main amber glowing orbs and a blue flashing cylinder about 2\3 up between the 2 orbs. this object has been the exact same shape every time. on the 10th i saw it rise slowly over a 15 minute period, straight up and disappear, then become a dot, zip around with incredible maneuverability and then zip incredibly fast in a se direction toward buffalo. but my 23rd sighting, was too cloudy to see anything like that. this was spectacular, a number of people and i were in contact over the phone from the casino, and a friend of mine arrived to be awe struck by the sighting.
